title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOTIC INDUCTION / Q&A WITH DR. MARCO PARET
description:
In this video, we can see Gica, who is an excellent student of Dr. Paret. She achieved a powerful non-verbal hypnotic induction with other students, that participated in Dr. Paret's masterclass and learned the most unique non-verbal hypnotic techniques. Dr. Paret will share important secrets in a "Q&A". He will talk about, how non-verbal hypnosis can improve our personal life and why we should work with this powerful force. Feel free to ask him more questions in the comment section! Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info
